hooks.prompt: A PHP file was written. Briefly check for Laravel best practices: 1) N+1 query patterns? 2) Mass assignment vulnerability? 3) Missing input validation? Only mention if critical issues found.

PostToolUse.description: Check Laravel best practices after PHP file write

hooks.prompt: A Model file was written. Check: 1) Is $fillable defined? 2) Are relationships typed? 3) Are $casts defined? Only flag critical issues.
A Controller was written. Check: 1) Using Form Requests? 2) Methods under 30 lines? 3) Authorization handled? Only flag critical issues.
A Migration was written. Check: 1) Foreign keys indexed? 2) Has down() method? 3) Nullable columns marked? Only flag issues.
